a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Death rate in state-based conflicts by conflict type, World, 1946 to 2020
Deaths per 100,000 people. Included are deaths of soldiers and civilians from fighting, excluded are deaths from
disease or famine. State-based conflicts are between states, or a state and a non-state armed group.
Data source: OWID based on PRIO and UCDP
Note: The sources' 'best' estimates are used, or - if unavailable - the mid-point between high and low estimates.
